metadata.description: Not used, but needed to pass arm-ttk test `Location-Should-Not-Be-Hardcoded`.  We instead use the `workspace-location` which is derived from the LA workspace

subscription id where Microsoft Sentinel is setup

connectorUiConfig.title: Anvilogic
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: The Anvilogic data connector allows you to pull events of interest generated in the Anvilogic ADX cluster into your Microsoft Sentinel

sampleQueries.description: Get a sample of Anvilogic events of interest

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: Read and Write permissions are required.

customs.name: Anvilogic Application Registration Client ID and Client Secret
customs.description: To access the Anvilogic ADX we require the client id and client secret from the Anvilogic app registration

instructionSteps.description: Complete the form to ingest Anvilogic Alerts into your Microsoft Sentinel
instructionSteps.title: Connect to Anvilogic to start collecting events of interest in Microsoft Sentinel

QueryParameters.csl: eoi | extend TimeGenerated = ingestion_time() | where TimeGenerated between (datetime({_QueryWindowStartTime}) .. datetime({_QueryWindowEndTime})) and avl_rule_mode != 'Warn' | project data = pack_all() | summarize list_data = make_list(data)

properties.description: Anvilogic_Alerts_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 3.0.0

properties.descriptionHtml:
Note: Please refer to the following before installing the solution:

• Review the solution Release Notes

• There may be known issues pertaining to this Solution, please refer to them before installing.

The Anvilogic solution for Microsoft Sentinel enables you to ingest Anvilogic Alerts into Microsoft Sentinel.

Underlying Microsoft Technologies used:

This solution takes a dependency on the following technologies, and some of these dependencies either may be in Preview state or might result in additional ingestion or operational costs:

  1. Codeless Connector Framework (CCF)

Data Connectors: 1, Analytic Rules: 1

Learn more about Microsoft Sentinel | Learn more about Solutions
